backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a live TV backend with channel management, user profiles, favourites, and playlists â€” all protected by role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the 'Favourites' section/page view feature (REQ-17) to its implementing files: Navigation.tsx and ChannelBrowser.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS custom properties for both light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, primary, secondary, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the StreamVault app, loading Inter and Barlow Condensed fonts from Google Fonts and the hls.js CDN script for HLS stream playback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that simply renders the ChannelBrowser page inside the app tree.
Modal dialog component for adding a new IPTV channel, with form fields for name, stream URL, thumbnail, language, and country, plus client-side validation.
frontend/src/components/AddToPlaylistPop: Popover component that lets authenticated users add or remove a backend channel from any of their playlists, with loading and pending states per playlist.
frontend/src/components/ChannelCard.tsx: Renders a single channel card with thumbnail, live badge, favourite toggle, and playlist popover; supports selected state and requires authentication for interactive actions.
frontend/src/components/ChannelGrid.tsx: Displays a responsive grid of ChannelCard components with loading skeleton states and an empty-state message when no channels are available.
frontend/src/components/CreatePlaylistMo: Modal dialog for creating a new playlist by entering a name, using the useCreatePlaylist mutation with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/FilterControls.t: Provides a search input plus language and country dropdown filters for narrowing the channel list, with a clear-filters button when filters are active.
frontend/src/components/M3UChannelCard.t: Renders a single M3U channel card with thumbnail, live badge, selected indicator, and a local favourite toggle button, mirroring ChannelCard but for M3U-parsed channels.
frontend/src/components/M3UChannelGrid.t: Displays a responsive grid of M3UChannelCard components with skeleton loading states and an empty-state message, analogous to ChannelGrid but for M3U channels.
frontend/src/components/M3UVideoPlayer.t: A React video player component for M3U channels that uses HLS.js for streaming, with support for fullscreen mode, auto-hiding overlay controls, and favourite toggling.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: A sticky header navigation component that handles Internet Identity auth, playlist filtering (all/favourites/playlist), playlist creation, and deletion via a dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog for first-time users to set a display name, which is saved via the backend profile mutation before completing onboarding.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: A React video player for backend Channel objects that uses HLS.js with error recovery, loading/mute states, fullscreen support, and auto-hiding overlay controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalFavourites.ts: A hook that persists a set of favourite channel IDs to localStorage, exposing toggle and lookup helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useM3UChannels.ts: A React Query hook that fetches and parses an M3U playlist URL, falling back to a CORS proxy if the direct fetch fails, and caches results for 10 minutes.
frontend/src/hooks/useManualChannels.ts: React hook that manages a local list of manually added M3U channels, providing an `addChannel` function that creates uniquely-IDed channel objects and prepends them to state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including channels, favourites, user profiles, and playlists via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a dark cinematic CSS variable theme with custom utilities, scrollbar styles, and a pulse animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelBrowser.tsx: Main page component that loads M3U and manually added channels, handles filtering by favourites/playlists/language/country/search, and renders the channel grid, video player, and modals.
frontend/src/utils/m3uParser.ts: Parses M3U playlist text into an array of typed `M3UChannel` objects by extracting stream URLs and attributes like name, logo, language, and country.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom fonts, oklch-based CSS variable colors, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the dark cinematic UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features for an IPTV live TV browser app with HLS playback, filtering, favourites, and dark theme.
